text.div:
ProtocolStatus

The lifecycle status of a Protocol

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/protocol-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
draft DraftThis protocol is still under development
testing TestingThis protocol was authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing)
review ReviewThis protocol is undergoing review to check that it is ready for production use
active ActiveThis protocol is ready for use in production systems
withdrawn WithdrawnThis protocol has been withdrawn and should no longer be used
superseded SupersededThis protocol has been replaced and a different protocol should be used in its place

name: ProtocolStatus
description: The lifecycle status of a Protocol
